translation.en: Uh, in case you need a taxi while you're here. Oh. Thank you, Zain.
translation.de: -Falls Sie mal ein Taxi brauchen. -Oh. Danke, Zain.

translation.en: Uh, it's been taken care of.
Oh, well, at least let me tip you then.
Aw, it's so good to see you.
I can't believe we're finally here. We're doing this.
translation.de: Unfassbar, dass wir das endlich tun.

translation.en: I know. Come on. I've been waiting to open the duty-free.
Yeah. Oh, you waited. That's a first.
translation.de: Du hast gewartet. Das ist neu.

translation.en: Thanks for paying for the taxi.
Thank Jay. It's all on him.
Can we move in? Stay forever?
-[woman] That's it. -[Kate chuckles] Never going home. Think Rob would notice?
translation.de: Es steht fest. Ich bleibe. Glaubst du, Rob merkt es?

translation.en: -I think I forgot. -Well, you'll just have to go naked.
-You didn't have to get me anything. -I wanted to, though.
I just wanted to say thank you for planning this whole thing.
translation.de: Danke, dass du das geplant hast.

translation.en: And I've… I've really missed you so much.
[Beth] Here. I know you love black onyx.
translation.de: Hier. Ich weiß, du liebst schwarzen Onyx.

translation.en: I don't know what to wear. Nothing fancy enough.
translation.de: Ich habe nichts Schickes zum Anziehen.

translation.en: [Rob] So just go in your granny panties. You'll still look great.
translation.de: Du siehst auch in Oma-Höschen toll aus.

translation.en: I'm so tired. I just want to go to bed.
translation.de: Ich bin müde. Ich will schlafen.

translation.en: So go to bed. It's your holiday too.
translation.de: Mach doch. Ist auch dein Urlaub.

translation.en: No, no. Kate booked a restaurant. It'll be fun.
translation.de: Kate hat reserviert. Es wird sicher lustig.

translation.en: She misses your boobs, she says.
[laughs] What do you think? New dress.
I went on the post-breakup shopping spree to end all shopping sprees.
translation.de: Nach der Trennung war ich ordentlich shoppen.

translation.en: Oh, hey, Rob. How's it going?
Oh, is that my gorgeous goddaughter?
-Give her a kiss from me. -[Rob] I will.
I've got to put her down actually. You guys have a good night.
translation.de: Sie muss ins Bett. Schönen Abend euch.

translation.en: -I'll call you tomorrow. Bye. -Have a good time. Love you.
Ah, if I break my neck in these things, it's your fault. You look like a supermodel. You should keep them.
translation.de: -Wehe, ich breche mir in den Dingern was. -Du siehst wie ein Model aus. Behalte sie.

translation.en: -Have you settled in okay? -Yeah. Hi, I'm Beth.
-It's nice to meet you. -[car horn honks] Everything's great.
[Kate] Do you know what you want? [Beth] I don't know, but I need to eat soon.
translation.de: -Was willst du? -Keine Ahnung, aber ich muss was essen.

translation.en: I keep telling you it's on Jay.
He still hasn't taken me off his credit card.
I intend on discovering what the limit is before he notices. Won't he be mad?
translation.de: -Die reize ich bis ans Limit aus. -Wird er da nicht sauer?

translation.en: With any luck, he'll have an aneurysm and drop dead on top of his assistant.
translation.de: Mit Glück hat er ein Aneurysma und stirbt, auf seiner Assistentin.

translation.en: Uh, we'll start with a dozen raw oysters and a bottle of champagne.
translation.de: Ein Dutzend rohe Austern und eine Flasche Champagner.

translation.en: -The most expensive one on the menu. -[chuckles] Excellent.
I've been a crap friend. I should've been there for you.
translation.de: Ich war eine miese Freundin. Ich war nicht für dich da.

translation.en: You had a baby. You're forgiven.
I'm fine. Couldn't care less about Jay.
translation.de: Mir geht es gut. Jay ist mir egal.

translation.en: -And what about polyamory, girl? Ooh! -Polyamory, huh?
-[cork pops] -I can barely manage one relationship. -Who's talking about relationship? -[chuckles]
translation.de: -Mir reicht eine Beziehung. -Wer redet von Beziehungen?

translation.en: Anyway, enough about me. How about you?
translation.de: Aber genug von mir. Was ist mit dir?

translation.en: Mmm, and what about with you?
Are you getting any at least?
Isn't it about time you got back on the horse?
translation.de: Wäre es nicht langsam wieder Zeit?

translation.en: I… I just don't feel like it.
-Is he not doing it for you anymore? -[Beth] It's not Rob.
If you're not happy, take it from me, divorce is the answer.
translation.de: Wenn du unglücklich bist, mach es wie ich, lass dich scheiden.

translation.en: Especially when it comes with a big fat alimony paycheck.
Shut up. Go away. Go away.
translation.de: Halt den Mund. Lass mich in Ruhe.

translation.en: I'm afraid the card was rejected.
translation.de: Ich fürchte, die Karte wurde abgelehnt.

translation.en: -Jay. -Did he find out about the card?
Yeah. Turns out I did discover the limit.
translation.de: Ja. Ich habe das Limit erreicht.

translation.en: Do you want me to go halves? No. No, no, no.
-You get the drinks at the next place. -[Beth] Kate, I'm so sorry. I'm tired.
translation.de: -Du zahlst die nächsten Drinks. -Tut mir leid, ich bin müde.

translation.en: -And my boobs are like gonna explode. -[Kate] No, no, no.
I have to pump. They're full, and I can't.
-And we have the bike tour tomorrow. -Oh, yeah, the bike tour.
translation.de: -Und wir machen morgen eine Radtour. -Ja, stimmt.
Lass uns noch einmal jung sein.

translation.en: It took me months to convince you to come away. Who knows when we're going to do it again.
translation.de: Ich musste dich monatelang überreden. Wer weiß, wann das nächste Mal ist.

translation.en: The entrance is just around there.
Oh, wait, wait, wait. I just want to fix my face and powder my nose.
translation.de: Warte. Ich mache mich frisch und pudere mir die Nase.

translation.en: California originally, but I've lived in London the last 15 years.
translation.de: Kalifornien, aber ich lebe seit 15 Jahren in London.

translation.en: You left Syria because of the war.
translation.de: Sind Sie vor dem Krieg geflohen?

translation.en: No, not, not very well. Um, just a little bit.
translation.de: -Sie sprechen Arabisch? -Nein. Nicht sehr gut. Nur ein wenig.

translation.en: I work with the Global Rescue Initiative, or I used to.
translation.de: Ich habe für die Global Rescue Initiative gearbeitet.

translation.en: -No, no, you get the next round. -[bartender] What can I get you?
Oh my God, look over there. Hot.
translation.de: Oh mein Gott, sieh mal, da drüben. Heiß.

translation.en: -[bartender] Here you go. -We should go over there.
-Mind if we join you? -No, I'm sure they're waiting for someone.
translation.de: -Dürfen wir uns setzen? -Nein. Sie warten sicher auf jemanden.

translation.en: No, no, please, be our guests.
I don't think I've seen you here before. I would have noticed you.
translation.de: Du musst neu hier sein. Du wärst mir aufgefallen.

translation.en: [man 2] I love your dress. You look like a disco ball.
translation.de: Tolles Kleid. Sieht aus wie eine Discokugel.

translation.en: You want to see pictures of my baby?
When was the last time you got hit on by someone that hot?
translation.de: Wann hat dich zuletzt so ein Adonis angemacht?

translation.en: Come on, we were just saying you need to get back on the horse.
translation.de: Na los, du brauchst mal wieder Sex.

translation.en: [Kate] So? Rob doesn't have to find out.
translation.de: Und? Rob muss es ja nicht erfahren.

translation.en: One night of excitement might bring you out of your rut.
translation.de: Eine aufregende Nacht könnte eure Beziehung wiederbeleben.

translation.en: We were just saying how you should come back to ours.
translation.de: Ihr solltet mit zu uns kommen.

translation.en: [on voicemail] Hi, you've got Kate, or maybe you haven't, so leave a message.
translation.de: Hi, hier ist Kate oder auch nicht. Hinterlasse eine Nachricht.

translation.en: [Beth] Hey, did you get my text?

translation.de: -Hast du meine SMS gelesen? -Was? Nein. Ich mache mir Sorgen.

translation.en: It's already noon, and Kate hasn't come home. Okay.
So she's probably gone for a coffee or a wander or something.
translation.de: Sie trinkt sicher einen Kaffee oder ist spazieren.

translation.en: I did. I drank a bit much.
Honestly, I can barely remember anything.
translation.de: Ich erinnere mich an fast nichts.

translation.en: Right. And what are you doing today?
We're meant to be doing a bike tour.
There you go. That's why she's vanished. Should've told her it was a shopping tour.
translation.de: Darum ist sie abgetaucht. Sie mag nur Shoppingtouren.

translation.en: She… She didn't leave a note, and she hasn't texted either.
translation.de: Es gibt keine Notiz oder Nachricht von ihr.

translation.en: -I'll let you know if I hear. Love you. -[Rob] Bye.
I'm sorry to bother you. Uh… Have you see my friend?
translation.de: Verzeihung. Haben Sie meine Freundin gesehen?

translation.en: I'm looking for her. Um, Kate.
I think she went out, and I can't get a hold of her.
translation.de: Ich kann sie leider nicht erreichen.

translation.en: You haven't seen her, have you?
You're not allowed to have parties. It says so very clearly in the rules.
translation.de: Partys sind nicht erlaubt. Das stand in den Regeln.

translation.en: And I have to charge you for the two extra guests that stayed over.
translation.de: Die zwei Gäste extra muss ich berechnen.

translation.en: [officer] What was the name of the bar?
[officer] Okay, let me see her photo.
translation.de: Ok, zeigen Sie mir ein Foto.

translation.en: So you brought two men back to your apartment.
translation.de: Sie nahmen zwei Männer mit nach Hause.

translation.en: -And you don't remember their names. -[Beth] Well…
-Had you been drinking? -[chuckles] Yeah, a little.
translation.de: -Nein, kenne… -Haben Sie getrunken? Ja, ein wenig.

translation.en: More than a little if you don't remember anything.
translation.de: So viel, dass Sie nichts mehr wissen.

translation.en: I'm… I'm just not used to drinking, that's all.
I… I just had a baby. So…
translation.de: Ich bin gerade erst Mutter geworden, daher…

translation.en: Okay, your friend probably go out clubbing or to a bar.
translation.de: Ihre Freundin ist sicher in einen Club oder eine Bar gegangen.

translation.en: So we're supposed to be doing things, sightseeing and…
Did you check the hospitals? Maybe she had an accident.
Yeah. I did, but there's no record of her being admitted.
translation.de: Ja, aber sie wurde nirgends eingeliefert.

translation.en: [scoffs] Her friend ditched her for some guy, and she's upset.
translation.de: Ihre Freundin ist durchgebrannt. Sie macht sich Sorgen.

translation.en: [in English] Does she have her bag with her? Her wallet, her passport, keys?
translation.de: Hat sie Geldbörse, Pass und Schlüssel bei sich?

translation.en: [in English] Can I file a missing persons report?
No, you can't because you need to wait 24 hours.
translation.de: Nein, dafür müssen Sie 24 Stunden warten.

translation.en: Most people show up before then.
I'm sure your friend will too.
-Thanks for picking me up. -It was close by. It's no bother.
translation.de: -Danke fürs Kommen. -Ich war in der Nähe. Kein Problem.

translation.en: [sighs] I couldn't remember the name of the bar last night.
translation.de: Wie hieß die Bar von gestern?

translation.en: -You want me to come in with you? -No.
You served us. We were sitting right there with two guys.
translation.de: Sie haben uns bedient. Wir saßen genau da mit zwei Typen.

translation.en: She was wearing a blue dress.
What are you doing? Figured you could use some help.
[scoffs] I didn't know that was an actual, real thing?
I didn't hire them. Then your friend must have.
translation.de: -Ich habe sie nicht bezahlt. -Dann war es Ihre Freundin.

translation.en: No, she didn't hire them either.
translation.de: Nein, die war es auch nicht.

translation.en: One night of excitement might bring you out of your rut.
translation.de: Eine aufregende Nacht könnte eure Beziehung wiederbeleben.

translation.en: She kept going on and on about how I needed to have some fun.
translation.de: Sie sagte ständig, ich bräuchte etwas Spaß.

translation.en: I wondered why he was into me.
The barman says he's seen them there a lot.
translation.de: Laut dem Barkeeper sind sie oft da.

translation.en: [sighs] Does he know how to get a hold of them?
Uh, he only knew their first names.
translation.de: Nein, er kannte nur ihre Vornamen.

translation.en: Come on. I'll take you back.
[Rob on phone] You went to the police?
I mean, this is Kate we're talking about. She's not exactly reliable.
translation.de: Ich meine, es ist Kate. Sie ist nicht gerade verlässlich.

translation.en: [Beth] No, no, she wouldn't do this to me. Leave without telling me?
translation.de: Nein, das würde sie nicht tun. Einfach abhauen?

translation.en: How many times on a night out did she ditch you for a bloke she just met?
translation.de: Wie oft hat sie dich wegen einem Kerl stehen lassen?

translation.en: [Beth] No, I've left her dozens of messages.
I've got some brilliant pictures to show you of Aster by the way.
translation.de: Ich muss dir ein paar tolle Fotos von Aster zeigen.

translation.en: Earlier on, we were watching The Godfather, and it turns out
translation.de: Wir haben uns Der Pate angesehen.

translation.en: she really likes the part where they find the horse's head in the bed.
translation.de: Scheinbar mag sie den Teil mit dem Pferdekopf im Bett.

translation.en: Well, we're seeing you tomorrow. Do you need me to pick you up from the airport?
translation.de: Soll ich dich morgen vom Flughafen abholen?

translation.en: I can't believe it's nearly Sunday already.
-I'll have to change my flight. -You can't.
-What about Aster? -You don't think I want to come home, Rob?
translation.de: -Was ist mit Aster? -Ich will ja nach Hause.

translation.en: Yeah. God, of course. Yeah, sorry.
-Do… Do you need me to come over? -No, It's okay.
translation.de: Soll ich kommen? Nein, schon gut.

translation.en: All right. Just call if you need me, yeah?
translation.de: Ruf an, wenn du was brauchst.

translation.en: [Zain] I called and said I wanted to hire them for a private party.
translation.de: Ich sagte, ich möchte sie für eine Privatparty buchen.

translation.en: What if they don't know anything, or what if they won't tell us?
translation.de: Und wenn sie nichts wissen oder nichts sagen wollen?

translation.en: -Maybe we should go to the police. -No, I'll handle it.
translation.de: -Wir sollten zur Polizei. -Nein, ich regle das.

translation.en: I was on a semester abroad.
I met my husband Rob through her.
translation.de: Sie stellte mich meinem Mann vor.

translation.en: We hit it off straight away.
You know, right away, she's an extrovert.
translation.de: -Von Anfang an. Sie ist extrovertiert. -"Karneeba" würde meine Frau sagen.
-Von Anfang an. Sie ist extrovertiert. -"Karneeba" würde meine Frau sagen. -"Karneeba", was ist das? -Ja.

translation.en: Carneebeh. How did you meet your wife?
She was a doctor at the hospital where I was doing my nursing training?
translation.de: Sie war Ärztin in dem Krankenhaus, in dem ich als Pfleger arbeitete.

translation.en: She believed me when I say I was a nice guy
translation.de: Sie glaubte mir, dass ich nett sei

translation.en: and agreed to go out with me. [chuckles]
Is Mina okay with you helping me?
translation.de: Ist es ok für sie, dass Sie mir helfen?

translation.en: -The woman you were with Friday night. -Kate! What have you done with her?
translation.de: -Die Frau von Freitagnacht. -Kate! Was habt ihr getan?

translation.en: -I have done nothing. -So why did you run just now?
-She hired us for a good time. That's all. -[Zain] Don't lie to me!
-What's he saying? -[Zain] They took her handbag?
When was the last time you saw her?
translation.de: Wann hast du sie zuletzt gesehen?

translation.en: [Zain] 3:00 a.m. What'd you do with the bag? Answer!
translation.de: Um 3 Uhr morgens. Und die Tasche? Antworte!
Habt ihr mich unter Drogen gesetzt?

translation.en: Did you put something in my water at the bar?
translation.de: -Habt ihr mir was ins Getränk getan? -Rede!
-Habt ihr mir was ins Getränk getan? -Rede! Nein!

translation.en: I don't need to drug women. Come on. Please let me go. Okay?
translation.de: Das habe ich nicht nötig. Lasst mich gehen. Ok?

translation.en: Please, I'll get you the bag. Okay? Please.
[in Croatian] I didn't know they were stolen!
translation.de: Ich wusste nichts von dem Raub.

translation.en: -[Zain] You think you were drugged? -[Beth] I've never been that drunk before?
translation.de: -Sie gaben Ihnen Drogen? -Ich war noch nie so blau.

translation.en: They got me a glass of water. They could've slipped something into it.
translation.de: Sie hätten mir was ins Wasser tun können.

translation.en: What if they drugged Kate too, you know? So they could rob us.
translation.de: Kate auch. Damit sie uns ausrauben können.

translation.en: Why didn't they take your bag too?
translation.de: Wieso war Ihre Tasche dann nicht weg?

translation.en: Well, she did hire them to have sex with you.
translation.de: Immerhin hat sie die Escorts gebucht.

translation.en: [Beth] No, no. She would never hurt me.
translation.de: Nein. Sie würde mir nie wehtun.

translation.en: I don't want to get in trouble.
If they revoke my visa, I have no place else to go.
Listen, I'm sorry for dragging you into all this.
translation.de: Tut mir leid, dass ich Sie mit hineinziehe.

translation.en: You're not dragging me into anything.
translation.de: Sie ziehen mich in nichts hinein.

translation.en: Stop saying sorry. Call me if you need me, okay?
translation.de: Sagen Sie das nicht. Rufen Sie an, wenn Sie mich brauchen.

translation.en: And look, now I have proof. Something must have happened to her.
translation.de: Das ist der Beweis. Ihr muss etwas zugestoßen sein.

translation.en: Let's not jump to conclusions. Let's start with details.
-Your friend's name, date of birth-- -No, I gave this to him already yesterday.
translation.de: -Ihr Name, Geburtsdatum… -Das hatten wir doch gestern schon.

translation.en: -You didn't file it? -He told me to come back in 24 hours.
I figured her friend was out partying.
translation.de: Ich dachte, ihre Freundin sei feiern.

translation.en: [scoffing] They brought two escorts back to their apartment. They were drunk. Probably high on drugs.
translation.de: Sie nahmen zwei Escorts mit nach Hause. Klingt nach Alkohol, vielleicht Drogen.

translation.en: No, I… I wasn't doing drugs. And… I didn't know they were escorts.
translation.de: Ich nahm keine Drogen. Und ich wusste nicht, dass sie Escorts waren.

translation.en: Something bad has happened to her.
[Kate] I don't think they're serial killers, Beth.
translation.de: Sie sehen nicht wie Mörder aus.

translation.en: And even if they are, I don't know if I care. Look at them.
translation.de: Selbst wenn, was soll's? Sieh sie dir an.

translation.en: You need to interview these men.
they might have drugged me or maybe both of us.
translation.de: sie setzten mich oder uns beide vielleicht unter Drogen.

translation.en: You just said you didn't do drugs.
I… I didn't do drugs. I was drugged.
translation.de: Nein, man setzte mich unter Drogen.

translation.en: -There's a difference. -Funny you didn't mention it before.
'Cause I wasn't sure. I'm still not.
translation.de: Ich war unsicher. Ich bin es noch.

translation.en: [in Croatian] Can you get her some water?
translation.de: Holst du ihr mal ein Wasser?

translation.en: Then run these names through the system.
translation.de: Gib die Namen ins System ein.

translation.en: [in English] I'm sorry about my colleague.
is it possible you may have been assaulted?
Well, when we're done here, we'll take you to the hospital
translation.de: Wenn wir fertig sind, bringen wir Sie ins Krankenhaus

translation.en: for a drug test and a checkup.
And they admitted they stole it,
and then gave it back to you.
I explained Kate was missing, and I…
translation.de: Ich erklärte, dass Kate vermisst wird

translation.en: told them I wouldn't go to the police if they gave it back to me.
translation.de: und versprach, keine Polizei, wenn sie sie zurückgeben.

translation.en: [nurse] Any signs of sexual assault are still inconclusive.
translation.de: Wir können noch nicht sagen, ob es eine Vergewaltigung gab.

translation.en: We'll have those results and the results of the blood test within 24 hours.
translation.de: In 24 Stunden haben wir alle Ergebnisse und wissen mehr.

translation.en: -[Jay] It's a classic Kate move. -Going missing?
Always has to be the center of attention.
She wore red on our wedding day, I mean,
should've taken that as a warning of sharks in the water. You haven't talked to her then?
translation.de: -Das hätte mich warnen sollen. -Sie hat sich nicht bei dir gemeldet?

translation.en: [Jay] No, not for weeks. It's been bliss.
-No, no, you talked to her Friday night. -No, I didn't.
She said you called her about the credit card.
What credit card? All communication has to go through our lawyers.
translation.de: Was? Wir dürfen nur über Anwälte kommunizieren.

translation.en: Look, Beth, I can actually guarantee this whole disappearance act
translation.de: Hör zu, Beth, ich garantiere dir, ihr Verschwinden ist nur

translation.en: is a lot of bollocks, all right.
What credit card by the way?
What? Are you saying she's… [scoffs] faking her disappearance?
translation.de: Wie? Willst du sagen, sie tut nur so, als sei sie verschwunden?

translation.en: Why? Why would she do that?
translation.de: Wieso? Wieso sollte sie das tun?

translation.en: Because drama is embedded in her DNA like an extra chromosome.
translation.de: Weil Drama Teil ihrer DNA ist wie ein extra Chromosom.

translation.en: She once ran off to New York for a week after we had an argument
translation.de: Sie flog nach einem Streit mal nach New York.

translation.en: with no word if she was dead or alive.
translation.de: Für eine Woche, ohne ein Wort.

translation.en: All right, just trust me, she likes to punish people.
translation.de: Glaub mir, sie bestraft Leute gern.

translation.en: Look, I gotta go. Just call me, and let me know what happens, all right?
translation.de: Ich muss los. Halt mich auf dem Laufenden, ok?

translation.en: -Did you go to the police? -[Beth] Yeah, they're looking for her.
translation.de: -Waren Sie bei der Polizei? -Ja, die sucht sie.

translation.en: I'm staying till they find her.
If your friend shows up, at least you will be close by.
translation.de: Wenn sie auftaucht, sind Sie in der Nähe.

translation.en: Uh, there should be towels in the bathroom, and…
just let me know if you need anything else.
translation.de: Rufen Sie, falls Sie noch etwas brauchen.

translation.en: I think you're gonna love it.
[on voicemail] You've reached Rob, leave me a message after the--
translation.de: Hier ist Rob. Hinterlassen Sie eine…

translation.en: I was about to order in.
Uh, I… I was about to go out actually.
I had to get out of there.
Let's get some food before we start looking.
-I know a very good Syrian-- -[Rob] Beth.
Uh, what are you doing here?
I've been calling you all day to let you know I was on my way.
translation.de: Ich rief ständig an, um es dir zu sagen.

translation.en: My parents are away. Remember? In the Dordogne. She'll be fine.
translation.de: Meine Eltern sind doch weg. In Dordogne. Ihr geht es gut.

translation.en: -Sorry, am I interrupting something? -No. This is Zain.
translation.de: Störe ich? Nein. Das ist Zain.

translation.en: He's a taxi driver. And he's been helping me look for Kate.
translation.de: Er ist Taxifahrer und sucht mit mir nach Kate.

translation.en: Let me know if you hear anything.
Who the bloody hell is he? [chuckles]
-I just told you. He's the taxi driver. -Who you were going to dinner with.
Give me a break. He's been helping me.
He… He drove me and Kate to a bar the night that she went missing--
translation.de: Er fuhr mich und Kate zu einer Bar, am Abend ihres Verschwindens…

translation.en: Beth, are you kidding? What if he's involved?
translation.de: Was? Und wenn er was damit zu tun hat?

translation.en: [scoffs] No. You were just about to get into a car with him.
I didn't mean to upset you.
Why didn't you tell me? I would've flown straight over.
translation.de: Wieso hast du nichts gesagt? Ich wäre gekommen.

translation.en: I couldn't tell you over the phone.
Do the police think they're involved in her going missing?
They don't seem to have a clue. And they're barely lifting a finger to find her.
translation.de: Die rührt kaum einen Finger, um sie zu suchen.

translation.en: [Rob] What if Jay's right, and she's messing with us?

translation.de: Nein. Ich kenne Kate. Sie würde…

translation.en: She likes to be the center of attention, yes, but she wouldn't do this to me.
translation.de: Sie mag Aufmerksamkeit, aber das würde sie mir nicht antun.

translation.en: [man] She's been in the water for some time.
It's too soon to say. The autopsy will tell us more.
translation.de: Dazu müssen wir die Obduktion abwarten.

translation.en: But you think it was an accident? [sniffles] That she fell in?
translation.de: War es ein Unfall? Ist sie ins Wasser gefallen?

translation.en: Or do you think she was killed?
We need to wait for the result of the autopsy.
We'll be in touch when we know more.
I feel bad, you know, for finding her annoying.
translation.de: Ich fand sie auch noch nervig.

translation.en: I have to get going soon. You sure you don't want to come with me?
translation.de: Ich muss los. Willst du sicher nicht mit?

translation.en: We talked about this. I have to…
stay till after the autopsy and…
translation.de: bis nach der Obduktion bleiben und…

translation.en: -There's the arrangements to figure out. -Yeah. Sorry. Sorry.
translation.de: -Es gibt einiges zu regeln. -Ja. Tut mir leid.

translation.en: They can't tell if she was sexually assaulted given the state of the body.
translation.de: Eine Vergewaltigung ließ sich in ihrem Zustand nicht feststellen.

translation.en: And the fact she had sex with multiple partners
translation.de: Aber sie hatte an dem Abend Sex

translation.en: on the night she went missing.
I want to say goodbye. Properly.
Can I have a minute? Please?
translation.de: Geben Sie mir einen Moment? Bitte.

translation.en: [on voicemail] You've reached Rob, leave me a message after the tone.
translation.de: Rob hier. Hinterlassen Sie eine Nachricht nach dem Ton.

translation.en: It shows high levels of cocaine and ketamine in Kate's system.
translation.de: Kate hatte hohe Mengen Kokain und Ketamin im Blut.

translation.en: Did you know she was taking drugs?
You'd already made a judgment about who she was.
I thought it would stop you looking for her, and it did.
translation.de: Ich dachte, sie würden dann nicht nach ihr suchen. Zu Recht.

translation.en: [Kovac] The results of your blood work came back too. They also found traces of ketamine.
translation.de: Ihre Blutwerte sind auch da. Ebenfalls Spuren von Ketamin.

translation.en: See. I… I told you I was drugged.
translation.de: Sehen Sie? Man setzte mich unter Drogen.

translation.en: [Kovac] We interviewed the two men you identified.
translation.de: Wir haben die zwei Männer befragt.

translation.en: They deny giving you any illegal substances.

translation.de: Das ist ja auch logisch, oder?

translation.en: And they also have alibis for the time of the murder.
translation.de: Und Alibis für den Zeitpunkt des Mordes.

translation.en: A taxi driver picked them up outside your apartment.
translation.de: Ein Taxi holte sie vor Ihrer Wohnung ab.

translation.en: Their roommate can vouch for them too.
She's divorcing him. Isn't that a motive? He's in London.
translation.de: -Ist Scheidung kein Motiv? -Er ist in London.

translation.en: [Beth] It's only a two-hour flight from here.
We interviewed people from the Blue Parlour, and several people saw you and Kate arguing when you left.
translation.de: Diverse Leute aus dem Blue Parlour sahen Kate und Sie beim Gehen streiten.

translation.en: You didn't argue with Kate then, hours before she died?
translation.de: Sie stritten also nicht mit Kate, kurz vor ihrem Tod?
Entspann dich. Es ist ein Abenteuer.

translation.en: I thought you didn't recall anything about that night.
translation.de: Ich dachte, Sie erinnern sich an nichts?

translation.en: I… I passed out in the taxi, but I remember some things.
translation.de: Ab dem Taxi ist alles weg, aber ein paar Dinge weiß ich.

translation.en: You think I have something to do with Kate's murder?
translation.de: Soll ich etwas mit Kates Mord zu tun haben?

translation.en: Is there anything else you haven't told us?
[officer] We need your passport until we can verify your statement.
translation.de: Wir brauchen Ihren Pass, bis Ihre Aussage geprüft wurde.

translation.en: If you remember anything, call me.
[in English] Let's hope your story checks out.
Didn't you? Why didn't you tell me?
translation.de: Stimmt's? Wieso hast du nichts gesagt?

translation.en: Look, I was going to, but, uh, you were about to have a baby.
translation.de: Ich wollte, aber du warst schwanger.

translation.en: My husband was having an affair with my best friend,
translation.de: Mein Mann hat was mit meiner besten Freundin,

translation.en: and you didn't think I had the right to know.
How long was it going on for?
I guess she was trying to get back at me. Tit for Tat.
translation.de: Sie wollte sich wohl an mir rächen.

translation.en: You know they had a thing at Uni.
translation.de: Sie hatten in der Uni was.

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, a drunken one-night stand at freshman week.
-What are you saying? -[Jay] I'm not saying anything.
It's just, you know, maybe there were some latent feelings on her part.
translation.de: Vielleicht hatte sie noch Gefühle für ihn.

translation.en: [Beth] How could I have not seen it?
We don't see what we don't want to see.
translation.de: Wir sehen nur, was wir sehen wollen.

translation.en: I've been feeling so guilty for…

translation.de: Als wäre ich nicht dankbar genug

translation.en: to look up and see what was staring me in the face.
translation.de: dass ich nicht erkannte, was direkt vor mir war.

translation.en: What if she did drug me so I would sleep with someone
translation.de: Und wenn sie mir Drogen gegeben hat, damit ich mit jemandem schlafe

translation.en: or not know if I had or hadn't?
translation.de: oder nicht weiß, ob ich mit wem geschlafen habe?

translation.en: Then she could get Rob to leave me.
Do you think he could have killed Kate?
And I spoke to him over the weekend.
translation.de: Ich sprach am Wochenende mit ihm.
Er war zu Hause bei Aster.

translation.en: You never wondered if it was me?
translation.de: Und mich haben Sie nie verdächtigt?

translation.en: Where I come from, we say Alalbek Daleelek.
translation.de: Wo ich herkomme, sagen wir: "Alalbek Daleelek".

translation.en: She was working in a clinic.
I was late to pick her up.
translation.de: Ich kam zu spät, um sie abzuholen.

translation.en: [Rob on phone] You there? Hello? Hi?
Hey, um, I was putting Aster down. Sorry, I got your message. You okay?
translation.de: Ich habe Aster ins Bett gebracht. Ist alles ok bei dir?

translation.en: Beth, what are you talking about?
That you were sleeping with her for months.
translation.de: Du hast monatelang mit ihr geschlafen.

translation.en: [chuckling nervously] Uh, what? What you talking about?
Stop treating me like an idiot. I found the text messages on her phone.
translation.de: Verkauf mich nicht für dumm. Ich sah die Nachrichten auf ihrem Handy.

translation.en: I don't know what to say. I'm sorry.
I only did it because we… When was the last time we had sex?
translation.de: Ich tat es, weil… Wann hatten wir zuletzt Sex?

translation.en: -You were depressed and I-- -No! You do not get to blame this on me.
translation.de: -Du warst depressiv… -Hör auf, mir die Schuld zu geben.

translation.en: -No, I'm not blam… Look, I'm sorry-- -[Beth] Stop apologizing!
translation.de: -Nein, ich… Tut mir leid. -Hör auf, dich zu entschuldigen!

translation.en: Look, you've just got to come home. We can't do this over the phone.
translation.de: Komm nach Hause. Klären wir das nicht am Handy.

translation.en: because the police have taken my passport because I'm sure they think I killed Kate.
translation.de: Die Polizei hat meinen Pass. Sie verdächtigen mich.

translation.en: And if they find out about the affair, they'll have a damn good reason too.
translation.de: Und die Affäre gäbe ihnen allen Grund dazu.

translation.en: -I am so sorry. -[Beth] Just shut up.
translation.de: -Es tut mir so leid. -Halt den Mund.

translation.en: [sniffling] I just want to see Aster.
Beth Jenner, we're arresting you on suspicion of the murder of Kate Thompson.
translation.de: Beth Jenner, Sie sind wegen Mordverdachts verhaftet.

translation.en: [officer] Put your hands behind your back. What?
For how long have you known Mr. Zakaria?
translation.de: Seit wann kennen Sie Mr. Zakaria?

translation.en: How did the two of you meet?
He took me and Kate to the bar on Friday night.
translation.de: Er brachte Kate und mich am Freitag zur Bar.

translation.en: He's been helping me look for her.
translation.de: Er half mir bei der Suche.

translation.en: Why didn't you tell us he was with you when you confronted the escorts?
translation.de: Er war beim Treffen mit den Escorts dabei.

translation.en: Or that he physically assaulted one of them?
He got them to admit it. He got the bag back.
translation.de: Dank ihm gaben sie die Tasche zurück.

translation.en: Mr. Zakaria is connected to organized crime.
translation.de: Mr. Zakaria hat Verbindungen zum organisierten Verbrechen.

translation.en: He's a member of an Albanian gang
translation.de: Er ist Mitglied einer albanischen Gang,

translation.en: involved in human trafficking, among other things.
You didn't know this about him?
No. No, of course not. What… What are you saying?
translation.de: Nein. Natürlich nicht. Worauf wollen Sie hinaus?

translation.en: [in English] And you hired him to do it.
This is insane! This is insane!
How do you… You can't possibly think I had anything to do with this!
translation.de: Wie können Sie… Ich hatte nichts damit zu tun!

translation.en: Please! Why would I want Kate dead?
translation.de: Bitte! Wieso sollte ich Kate töten?

translation.en: Because she was having an affair with your husband.
translation.de: Sie hatte eine Affäre mit Ihrem Mann.

translation.en: You didn't think we'd find out.

translation.de: Ich weiß es erst seit gestern.

translation.en: Jay has known about it for months.
We are speaking to him later today.
translation.de: Mit ihm reden wir später noch.

translation.en: Just because they haven't charged you doesn't mean they won't.
translation.de: Sie sind noch nicht angeklagt, aber das kann sich ändern.

translation.en: It is only because they don't have enough evidence yet.
translation.de: Bislang haben sie nur nicht genug Beweise.

translation.en: They were hoping they could press you on your connection to Mr. Zacharia,
translation.de: Sie wollten Ihnen mit Mr. Zakaria Druck machen,

translation.en: To what? I didn't do anything.
translation.de: Was gestehen? Ich habe nichts getan.

translation.en: Call me next time before you say anything to incriminate yourself.
translation.de: Rufen Sie nächstes Mal an, bevor Sie sich selbst belasten.

translation.en: What are you doing here? Your landlord let me in.
translation.de: -Was machen Sie hier? -Ihr Vermieter ließ mich rein.

translation.en: They told me you'd been arrested.
I was driving all Friday night until Saturday morning.
translation.de: Ich fuhr Freitagnacht bis Samstagmorgen Taxi.

translation.en: you have links to an Albanian criminal gang.
translation.de: Sie gehören einer kriminellen albanischen Gang an.

translation.en: I don't know. I don't know who to believe.
translation.de: Keine Ahnung. Ich weiß nicht, wem ich glauben soll.

translation.en: I saved the life of a boy who'd been hit with shrapnel in the leg.
translation.de: Ich habe einem Jungen im Krieg das Leben gerettet.

translation.en: His father has connections to an Albanian people-smuggling ring.
translation.de: Sein Vater hatte Verbindungen zu Menschenschmugglern.

translation.en: He got me out of Aleppo, crossed the border into Turkey then here.
translation.de: Er holte mich aus Aleppo raus, in die Türkei, dann hierher.
Er half mir mit dem Visum.

translation.en: So you don't work for this person?
translation.de: Sie arbeiten also nicht für ihn?

translation.en: How do I know you're telling me the truth?
translation.de: Woher weiß ich, dass das stimmt?

translation.en: [in Arabic] Your heart is your guide.
[Beth] You can't possibly think I had anything to do with this. Why would I want Kate dead?
translation.de: Ich hatte nichts damit zu tun! Wieso sollte ich Kate töten?

translation.en: Because she was having an affair with your husband.
translation.de: Sie hatte eine Affäre mit Ihrem Mann.

translation.en: My husband was having an affair with my best friend.
translation.de: Mein Mann hat was mit meiner besten Freundin,

translation.en: You didn't think I had the right to know?
Uh, my cell data ran out.
Could I get the Wi-Fi password?
[Sebastian] What happened with the police? They let you go.
translation.de: Hat die Polizei Sie gehen lassen?

translation.en: [Sebastian] And how much longer do you think you'll be staying here?
translation.de: Wie lange, denken Sie, werden Sie bleiben?

translation.en: A screening for a movie I supervised the music for.
translation.de: Zu einer Filmvorführung. Ich habe die Musik gemacht.

translation.en: Come on, come on, come on.
-Well, thanks. Are you sure? -[Kate] Yeah, no, for sure. Come on.
translation.de: -Toll. Danke. Bist du sicher? -Ja, klar. Komm.

translation.en: -[Mateo] Here we go. -[Kate] Watch your step.
Somebody's gonna have a beautiful night of sleep.
Let's get you ready for bed. Yeah. Whoa.
-[Beth] No! -No! Stop! It's not what you think!
translation.de: -Nein! -Nein. Es ist nicht, was Sie denken!

translation.en: You're taping people in the shower having sex!
translation.de: Sie filmen Leute in der Dusche beim Sex!

translation.en: And you knew what happened to Kate this whole time. You could have told the police.
translation.de: Sie wussten, was mit Kate passiert ist. Sie hätten aussagen können.

translation.en: You told them about my husband's affair, didn't you?
translation.de: Sie erzählten der Polizei von der Affäre, oder?

translation.en: What is that? No. Don't delete them.
translation.de: Was ist das? Nein. Nicht löschen!

translation.en: [Sebastian] Stop, you don't understand! Stop. I can explain.
translation.de: Sie verstehen nicht! Halt. Ich kann es erklären.

translation.en: He… He deleted all the videos.
He's gonna tell the police I attacked him. Oh my God, this is a nightmare.
translation.de: Er wird sagen, ich hätte ihn angegriffen. Oh mein Gott, das ist ein Albtraum.

translation.en: We'll find out where Kate went, then we can hopefully find out who brought her home.
translation.de: Wir finden heraus, wo Kate war und wer sie nach Hause brachte.

translation.en: Then we can go to the police. We will explain. It will be okay.
translation.de: Dann gehen wir zur Polizei. Alles wird gut.

translation.en: I gave him the license number. Driver is on his way.
translation.de: Ich nannte ihm das Nummernschild. Der Fahrer kommt gleich.

translation.en: Okay, I'll remember that for next time.
translation.de: Ok, ich merke es mir fürs nächste Mal.

translation.en: They say you're a suspect in Kate's murder.
You picked up a woman early Saturday morning around 3:00.
translation.de: Sie haben Samstagmorgen gegen 3 Uhr eine Frau gefahren.

translation.en: -She's my height, blonde hair. -[Zain] On Jerina Street.
We just need to know where you took her. That's all.
translation.de: Mehr müssen wir nicht wissen, nur das.

translation.en: She made me follow these two men. She said they stole her bag.
translation.de: Ich sollte zwei Männern folgen, die ihre Tasche geklaut hatten.

translation.en: I lost them on a one-way street.
[in English] What's he saying? Where'd you take her?
translation.de: Was sagt er? Wohin wollte sie?

translation.en: [Beth] If Kate reported her bag stolen,
translation.de: Wieso wusste die Polizei dann nicht von dem Diebstahl?

translation.en: why wasn't there a record of it when I reported her missing?
translation.de: Wieso wusste die Polizei dann nicht von dem Diebstahl? -Weil die Anzeige nie abgelegt wurde? -Pavic legte meine auch nicht ab.

translation.en: Maybe it never got filed. Pavic didn't file my report either.
translation.de: -Weil die Anzeige nie abgelegt wurde? -Pavic legte meine auch nicht ab.

translation.en: We need to get out of here.
[Kovac] Beth! Don't leave! We just want to talk.
translation.de: Beth! Zain! Wir wollen nur reden!

translation.en: I saw the sticker in the security footage.
translation.de: Ich sah den Aufkleber auf dem Video.

translation.en: He must've driven Kate home after she reported her bag stolen.
translation.de: Er muss Kate nach Hause gefahren haben.

translation.en: Oh my God. Oh my God. Oh my God.
It was him. It was him.
[Zain] Call your lawyer. -Make her meet you. -[Beth] Wait. Where are you going?
translation.de: -Rufen Sie Ihre Anwältin an. -Halt. Wo wollen Sie hin?
-Ganz ruhig. -Er war es! Glauben Sie mir.

translation.en: Believe me it's him. It's the cop who did it.
translation.de: -Ganz ruhig. -Er war es! Glauben Sie mir. -Der Polizist war es. -Wovon reden Sie?

translation.en: -[Kovac] What're you talking about? -[Zain] We saw the footage.
translation.de: -Der Polizist war es. -Wovon reden Sie? -Es gibt ein Video. -Welches Video?

translation.en: [Beth] You hit on her, didn't you?
My God, you did! You hit on her, and she rejected you!
translation.de: Mein Gott, das haben Sie. Und sie wies Sie zurück.

translation.en: She was a slut! That's what men call women who won't sleep with them!
And we recovered some of your landlord's footage.
translation.de: Und konnten Material Ihres Vermieters wiederherstellen.

translation.en: I'm so sorry I doubted you. You were right.
translation.de: Ich hätte Ihnen glauben sollen. Sie hatten recht.

translation.en: Pavic drove Kate home after she reported her bag stolen.
translation.de: Pavic fuhr Kate nach dem Diebstahl nach Hause.

translation.en: We think he did make a pass at her.
translation.de: Wir glauben, er hat sie angemacht.

translation.en: we can safely assume Pavic hit her over the back of the head,
translation.de: dass Pavic ihr einen Schlag gegen den Hinterkopf versetzte.

translation.en: and then dumped her body in the harbor
translation.de: Dann warf er sie ins Wasser.

translation.en: he arrested for sex work claimed he assaulted them.
translation.de: die er verhaftet hatte, beschuldigten ihn der Nötigung.

translation.en: but the women all withdrew their statements.
translation.de: aber die Frauen zogen alle ihre Aussage zurück.

translation.en: IA couldn't fire him, so unfortunately, they moved him over to the tourist division.
translation.de: Man konnte ihn nicht feuern, also kam er zur Tourismuspolizei.

translation.en: I ordered a search warrant on Luka and Mateo's apartment and workplace too.
translation.de: Wir haben auch Lukas und Mateos Wohnung und Arbeitsplatz durchsucht.

translation.en: They've been drugging the women who hired them then robbing them.
translation.de: Sie betäubten ihre Kundinnen, um sie auszurauben.

translation.en: but the cocaine in her system counteracted it.
translation.de: aber das Kokain in ihrem Körper steuerte dagegen.

translation.en: So I'm free to go then.
In case you want to press charges against your landlord.
translation.de: Falls Sie Ihren Vermieter anzeigen möchten.

translation.en: Uh, I just put the kettle on. Do you want to stay for a cuppa?
translation.de: Ich koche gerade Teewasser. Bleibst du auf eine Tasse?

translation.en: Uh, I packed clothes and Ernie the sheep in the bag.
translation.de: Kleidung und Ernie, das Schaf, sind in der Tasche.

translation.en: I can pop out and get some. No worries.
translation.de: Ich kann welche kaufen. Kein Problem.

translation.en: Hey, there's this kids' art thing at the park tomorrow.
translation.de: Morgen ist so eine Kunstsache für Kinder im Park.

translation.en: I was thinking of taking Aster if you fancy joining us.
translation.de: Ich wollte mit Aster hin, falls du Lust hast.

translation.en: Maybe we could have lunch after at Georgio's, the three of us.
translation.de: Wir könnten danach zu Georgio's, nur wir drei.

translation.en: You know, uh, I think you might have my spare car key.
translation.de: Ich glaube, du hast meinen Ersatzautoschlüssel.

translation.en: Yeah, it's probably in the bowl in the hallway or in my jacket.
translation.de: Ja, vermutlich in der Schale im Flur. Oder in meiner Jacke.

translation.en: Oh my God, I'm so sorry.
I… I got it online. I can send it back.
translation.de: Ich kaufte sie online. Ich kann sie zurückschicken.

translation.en: I can't find Ernie the sheep.
Where did you say it was?
It's… It's in the bag. I'll… I'll get it.
translation.de: In der Tasche. Ich zeige es dir.

translation.en: I'm gonna stay for that cup of tea.
If that's, uh, still up for offer.
translation.de: Wenn du noch einen für mich hast.

translation.en: Suppose you've got a lot to do before you start work on Monday.
translation.de: Vor Montag hast du sicher noch viel zu tun.

translation.en: Did you get the child-minding sorted?
You're looking at me strangely. Do you…
Is this some kind of joke?
You flew back Saturday morning. Won't be hard to check the flights.
translation.de: Samstagfrüh zurück. Es ließe sich leicht überprüfen.

translation.en: Beth, come on. You can't be serious.
translation.de: Beth. Das ist doch nicht dein Ernst.

translation.en: It's from her necklace, and I found it in your jacket.
translation.de: Von ihrer Kette. Die war in deiner Jackentasche.

translation.en: I can explain. It was an accident. Oh my God.
translation.de: -Es war so: Es war ein Unfall. -Oh mein Gott.

translation.en: -What did you do? -Stop. Wait. Listen to me. Listen to me.
translation.de: -Was hast du getan? -Halt. Warte. Hör mir zu.

translation.en: And I was waiting outside the apartment.
I'd been calling and texting. She wasn't picking up. I thought… I was terrified she told you.
translation.de: Sie antwortete mir nicht. Ich dachte, sie hätte es dir gesagt.

translation.en: She kept threatening to. I thought if she had, I could at least talk to you.
translation.de: Sie drohte damit. Ich wollte zumindest mit dir reden.

translation.en: I was about to leave, but then she showed up.
translation.de: Ich wollte gehen, da kam sie.

translation.en: Jesus. What the hell are you doing here?
You know this makes you a stalker.
I didn't have a choice. You wouldn't answer your phone.
Let's go. Come on. Come on.
We ended up down by the water, and we talked.
translation.de: Wir landeten am Wasser und redeten.

translation.en: You're gonna ruin her life. You wanna do that? I don't.
translation.de: Du ruinierst unser Leben. Willst du das? Ich nicht.

translation.en: we're doing this. You and me.
How many times? It meant nothing.
translation.de: Wie oft noch? Es hat nichts bedeutet.

translation.en: How can you say it meant nothing?
Why were we doing it if it meant nothing?
translation.de: Wieso haben wir es dann getan?

translation.en: I know. You have feelings for me.
translation.de: Ich weiß, du hast Gefühle für mich.

translation.en: She told me… She told me she was in love with me.
She, she, she… She kept begging me.
She was begging me to leave you.
She said you were unhappy. I'd be doing you a favor breaking up with you.
translation.de: Du seist unglücklich, es wäre gut für dich.

translation.en: I told her, I don't know how many times, that was never gonna happen.
translation.de: Ich sagte ihr, das würde ich nie tun.

translation.en: What happened between us was a mistake.
translation.de: Das mit uns war ein Fehler.

translation.en: It was the biggest mistake of my life?
[Kate] It was a rebound fling, and you…
translation.de: Du warst der Lückenbüßer. Du warst

translation.en: [sighs] …were in the right place at the right time.
translation.de: zur rechten Zeit am rechten Ort.

translation.en: Actually, from now on, I'm only telling the truth.
translation.de: Von jetzt an werde ich immer die Wahrheit sagen.

translation.en: -Maybe you should try it too. -[Rob] Please, please, Kate, please.
-Stop it! Get off me! -No, stop, listen to me!
She tripped and fell and banged her head.
translation.de: Sie stolperte und fiel auf den Kopf.

translation.en: I didn't mean to hurt her.
No. No, I… I thought she was dead.
translation.de: Nein. Ich hielt sie für tot.

translation.en: -No, you didn't. -[Rob] That's why I left her.
You're lying. I saw the autopsy report. She drowned.
translation.de: Du lügst. Ich sah den Bericht. Sie ertrank.

translation.en: -She was alive in the water when you left. -I'm telling the truth.
translation.de: -Sie war noch am Leben. -Ich lüge nicht.

translation.en: -You have to listen. -No, I don't have to listen!
translation.de: -Du musst zuhören. -Nein! Dir höre ich nie mehr zu.

translation.en: I will never listen to you again. I should've listened to Kate.
translation.de: -Du musst zuhören. -Nein! Dir höre ich nie mehr zu. Ich hätte auf Kate hören sollen.

translation.en: That's what the weekend was about.
She wanted to remind me who I was before I met you.
translation.de: Ich sollte mich erinnern, wer ich vor dir war.

translation.en: -What are you gonna do now, huh? -You killed my best friend.
translation.de: Wo willst du jetzt hin? -Du hast sie getötet. -Doch nicht zur Polizei?

translation.en: You're not gonna tell the police, are you?
translation.de: -Du hast sie getötet. -Doch nicht zur Polizei?

translation.en: What would be the point? The case's closed. That cop's dead.
translation.de: Der Fall ist abgeschlossen. Der Bulle ist tot.

translation.en: What good is me going to jail? Beth?
translation.de: Wozu sollte ich ins Gefängnis? Beth?

translation.en: Please, I'm begging you. I'm begging you.
You want her to grow up without a dad?
Come on, you know I'm not.
No. You are not calling the police.
translation.de: Nein. Du rufst nicht die Polizei.

translation.en: I got it all. The police are on their way. Beth?
[Beth] It's okay. Mama's got you. Mama's got you.
translation.de: Schon ok. Mama ist bei dir.

translation.en: ♪ When you came to me every night ♪
